text.base: The shed smells of rust and stale tobacco. A workbench along the far wall is covered in debris. A metal locker stands open, empty except for a faded calendar from 1998.

lens.believer: The calendar dates are circled in a pattern. Not shifts. Sacrifices. The phases of the moon align with the disappearances.
lens.skeptic: Squatter activity confirmed. But the dust patterns are wrong. Someone wiped the surfaces *clean* recently. Too clean.
lens.haunted: There's a name scratched into the locker paint. 'R. VANCE'. That's your mother's maiden name. She didn't work for the phone company.

interactions.search: You sift through the junk. Under a pile of copper wire, you find a logbook.

logbook.description: A dusty maintenance log. Property of [REDACTED].

interactions.read: Entry 412: 'Test Subject 04: Liquefied. Containment holds. Yield: 400%. The song is stabilizing.'

choices.label: Read the logbook on the workbench
